lead_paragraph: Buyouts are expected to return to heady pre-crisis levels and reach a frequency not seen since the height of the credit boom, Michael Queen, chief executive of 3i, told The Financial Times.
snippet: Buyouts are expected to return to heady pre-crisis levels and reach a frequency not seen since the height of the credit boom, Michael Queen, chief executive of 3i, told The Financial Times.
